Build notes

Some helpful notes about building the various components.

pkgdown

pkgdown::build_site()
pkgdown::build_articles()
workflow(); pkgdown::build_article("ansi_issue", lazy = FALSE, quiet = FALSE, new_process = FALSE)
workflow(); pkgdown::build_article("authoring")

single notebook

convert_ipynb("vignette/examples.ipynb")
pkgdown::build_article("examples", lazy = FALSE, quiet = FALSE, new_process = FALSE)

metayer

R CMD build .
VERSION=0.2.4 \
R CMD check metayer_${VERSION}.tar.gz

On this page

Developed by Dustin Lennon.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.0.
